name: agnosticui
description: An agnostic UI component library prioritizing clean HTML and CSS, but built to agnostically work with many popular JavaScript frameworks like React, Vue, and Svelte.

scripts.sync:angular: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-angular run syncStyles
scripts.sync:react: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-react run syncStyles
scripts.sync:vue: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-vue run syncStyles
scripts.sync:svelte: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-svelte run syncStyles
scripts.sync: yarn sync:react && yarn sync:angular && yarn sync:vue && yarn sync:svelte
scripts.lint: yarn lint:react && yarn lint:angular && yarn lint:svelte && yarn lint:vue && yarn lint:showcase
scripts.test: yarn sync:react && yarn test:react && yarn sync:vue && yarn test:vue && yarn sync:svelte && yarn test:svelte
scripts.start:css: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-css run start
scripts.start:angular: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-angular run storybook
scripts.start:react: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-react run storybook
scripts.start:vue: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-vue run storybook
scripts.start:svelte: yarn build:css && yarn workspace agnostic-svelte run storybook
scripts.start:showcase: yarn build:css && yarn workspace showcase run serve
